casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF: N.X.A.
and
In the Matter of: B.R.S.A-D. and D.S.K.A-D. No. 297P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2017 Richard Croutharmel, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Dowell, Jerry Ray. Mark L. Hayes, Attorney at Law, for Adams, Jennifer G. Erika Hamby, Attorney at Law, for Wilkes County DSS. Hillary Dawe, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for GAL.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the joint petition filed on the 5th of September 2017 by Respondent (Mother) and Respondent (Father) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of December 2017."
